title: 1999/350/EC: Commission Decision of 4 May 1999 excluding from Community financing certain expenditure incurred by the United Kingdom under the Guarantee Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF) (notified under document number C(1999) 1076) (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 4 May 1999
excluding from Community financing certain expenditure incurred by the United Kingdom under the Guarantee Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF)
(notified under document number C(1999) 1076)
(Only the English text is authentic)
(1999/350/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The expenditure declared by the United Kingdom under the EAGGF Guarantee Section, amounting to UK pounds 22807424, is excluded by this Decision from Community financing, for failure to comply with the Community rules.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 May 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
